gur-rightslog-entry:
Identical to {{msg-mw|Gblrights-rights-entry}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|Rightslogentry}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - list of user groups or empty string
* $3 - list of user groups or empty string
logentry-gblrights-rights:
Similar to {{msg-mw|logentry-rights-rights}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - (see below)
* $2 - the username of the user changing the rights
* $3 - the target username
* $4 - previous list of user groups or empty string
* $5 - new list of user groups or empty string
* $6 - see $3
* $7 - formatted changes to the user groups
